items.name: Segway City Tour
items.description: A guided tour of the city centre on self-balancing Seyway scooters, showing you historic buildings, the best shops and restaurants.

items.name: Boat Trip
items.description: Take in the sights from the water on this 1 hour cruise with commentary.

items.name: Ghost Walk
items.description: Enjoy a spooky evening guided walk around the most haunted parts of the city and hear local legends and ghost stories.

items.name: Day Trip
items.description: Get out of the city to see nearby historic sights. Fully airconditioned coach travel to and from city centre included.
